content:
This first level is also known as the Sixth Circle and it contains the Great Gate, as well as the city's main market square. The market square is where the citizens of Minas Tirith come to buy and sell goods, and it's also a place where you can find different kind of craftsmen and artisans.

Additionally, you can find the Houses of Healing on this level, where the wounded soldiers and citizens are treated. The Houses of Healing are run by the order of the Istari, and the healers are highly trained in the art of healing and medicine.

Also you can find the prison of the city called The dungeons of the city, where the criminals are held. It's not a regular stop on the tour, but is worth mentioning.

Any specific thing you would like to see here?
